org.araneaframework.core
Interface EventListener

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseMenuWidget.ItemSelectionListener, ListWidget.FirstPageEventHandler, ListWidget.JumpToPageEventHandler, ListWidget.LastPageEventHandler, ListWidget.NextBlockEventHandler, ListWidget.NextPageEventHandler, ListWidget.OrderEventHandler, ListWidget.PreviousBlockEventHandler, ListWidget.PreviousPageEventHandler, ListWidget.ShowAllEventHandler, ListWidget.ShowSliceEventHandler, MultiParamEventListener, ProxyEventListener, StandardControlEventListenerAdapter, StandardEventListener, StandardFlowContainerWidget.FlowCancelListener, TabContainerWidget.SelectionEventListener, ValidatingProxyEventListener
public interface EventListener
extends Serializable

A simple eventlistener which can be added to Composite Widgets.

Method Summary

          Gets called when the event happens.
 

Method Detail

processEvent

void processEvent(String eventId,
                  InputData input)
                  throws Exception
Gets called when the event happens.

Parameters:
eventId - The ID of the event.
input - The request data of the event.
Throws:
Exception - Any runtime exception that may occur.
